actions.description: The hammerer makes one Claw attack and one Hammer attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Hammer

conditionImmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
name: Duergar Hammerer [MoM]

specialTraits.description: The hammerer deals double damage to objects and structures.
specialTraits.name: Siege Monster
